Class Enquiry

java.lang.Object
bto.model.Enquiry
public class Enquiry extends Object
The enquiry class stores the enquries created in a list Enquiries Allows responses to the created enquiries Able to display the project ID, enquiry ID, Applicant who created the enquiry, enquiry message and response, and status of the enquiry
